titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Navy to convey, without consideration, to Piasecki Aircraft Corporation the right, title, and interest of the United States in and to Navy aircraft N40VT, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Seapower and Expeditionary Forces.

bill.summary: 3/18/2009--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to convey, without consideration, to Piasecki Aircraft Corporation of Essington, Pennsylvania, all U.S. rights and interest to Navy aircraft N40VT, and associated components and test equipment.
